title: MMS in bot games
body: So I was playing with this guy in Human vs comp mode and he was complaining that the team was doing so bad it was ruining his mms and that he was a diamond level player. I said relax it was bots. Maybe I didn't understand why he was so mad. WTF is MMS and how can anything you do in bot games hurt your rank or what have you?

replies.body: Then he was making a joke the whole game and raging about it

I assume it was "matchmaking score" (first time I've ever heard someone call it that). The actual term is MMR, Matchmaking Rating. It's basically how you "climb" in PvP modes.

There is no MMR in co-op. He was making a joke.
